dcterms:description: The BOBSL dataset consists of continuous sign language videos with weakly aligned English subtitles, aimed at facilitating large-vocabulary continuous sign language recognition.
dcterms:title: BOBSL

dcterms:creator: Oscar Koller
Jens Forster
Hermann Ney
dcterms:description: PHOENIX-2014 is a dataset for continuous sign language recognition, containing videos of multiple signers performing sign language with aligned spoken language subtitles.
dcterms:title: PHOENIX-2014

dcterms:creator: Hao Zhou
Wen gang Zhou
Weizhen Qi
Junfu Pu
Houqiang Li
dcterms:description: CSL-Daily is a dataset that provides videos of daily life topics with gloss and translation annotations, aimed at improving sign language translation.
dcterms:title: CSL-Daily

dcterms:creator: Amanda Duarte
Shruti Palaskar

Deepti Ghadiyaram

Xavier Giro-i Nieto
dcterms:description: How2Sign is a large-scale multi-modal dataset for continuous American Sign Language, designed to facilitate research in sign language recognition and translation.
dcterms:title: How2Sign

dcterms:creator: Necati Cihan Camgoz
Ben Saunders
Guillaume Rochette
Marco Giovanelli

Robin Nachtrab-Ribback
Richard Bowden
dcterms:description: Content4All is an open research dataset for sign language translation, providing a variety of sign language videos with corresponding translations.
dcterms:title: Content4All

dcterms:description: CSLR-TEST is a newly introduced dataset providing continuous sign-level annotations for evaluating large-vocabulary continuous sign language recognition.
dcterms:title: CSLR-TEST
